roleset.name: cause to move very quickly
roleset.note: PROPEL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'propel' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'move'. (from propel.01-v predicate notes)
PROPULSION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from propulsion.01-n)

example.name: no stated destination
example.text: On the Frankfurt Stock Exchange, share prices closed higher in fairly thin trading, as [selective buying by foreigners]-1 helped *trace*-1 propel prices.

example.name: with stated destination
example.text: Computer parts are getting ever smaller, Mr. Johnson said, a shrinking that *trace* has propelled laptops into position as the fastest-growing segment of the computer business.
example.arg: into position as the fastest-growing segment of the computer business
